title: Non-Western Art - A Brief Guide (Art Ebook).pdf
description:
pdf / English / 1995 Prentice Hall / ISBN 10 0131048945 / 160 pag / 27.1 MB

This book offers a concise, useful introduction to the indigenous visual expressions created in the Americas, Africa and Asia. It emphasizes the idea that Non-Western cultures have history, that known events occurred, important people lived, and that the arts changed through time. A global perspective on art covers Andean, Mesoamerican, Native American, African, Indian, Chinese and Japanese art, with additional coverage of expressions in Southeast Asia and The Pacific Islands.
